name: R.C. Bot Inc.
description: We are a small team with rendering, simulation and GTA modding background trying to create a new gameplay concept by doing a 100% physics based game that is fully unscripted and animation free. Because all of us work in technology day jobs that are somehow related to gaming, and because we have played and modded so many games since our childhood, we wanted to put something new on the map of videogames with the PhysX driven gameplay technique. We hope you enjoy it!
